mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopReview (reviewId, itemId, userId, reviewContent, reviewWriter, reviewCount, reviewDate, ordersDetailsId) VALUES (SHOPREVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{itemId}, #{userId}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewWriter}, #{reviewCount}, SYSDATE, #{ordersDetailsId})
mapper.select: SELECT sr.reviewId, sr.itemId, sr.userId, sr.reviewContent, sr.reviewWriter, sr.reviewCount, sr.reviewDate, sr.ordersDetailsId, u.userId AS u_userId, u.nickname AS u_nickname, u.profileImage AS u_profileImage FROM shopReview sr JOIN users u ON sr.userId = u.userId WHERE sr.itemId = #{itemId} ORDER BY sr.reviewDate DESC

SELECT sr.reviewId, sr.itemId, sr.userId, sr.reviewContent, sr.reviewWriter, sr.reviewCount, sr.reviewDate, sr.ordersDetailsId, u.userId AS u_userId, u.nickname AS u_nickname, u.profileImage AS u_profileImage FROM shopReview sr JOIN users u ON sr.userId = u.userId WHERE sr.itemId = #{itemId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{sortType} = 'latest' THEN reviewDate END DESC,
CASE WHEN #{sortType} = 'high' THEN reviewCount END DESC, CASE WHEN #{sortType} = 'low' THEN reviewCount END ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shopReview WHERE reviewId = #{reviewId} AND userId = #{userId}
